author: ianna
body:
* Further restructuring XML data directories by year and version
* Duplicate files are removed

This PR is based on fully signed and tested https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/17831

In addition it integrates GE11 overlap fix from https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/17830 in a new directory structure.

 rename Geometry/MuonCommonData/data/{v2 => csc/2015/v1}/csc.xml (100%)
 rename Geometry/MuonCommonData/data/{v2 => mfshield/2015/v1}/mfshield.xml (100%)
 create mode 100644 Geometry/MuonCommonData/data/mfshield/2017/v1/mfshield.xml
 rename Geometry/MuonCommonData/data/{PhaseII => mfshield/2023/v1}/mfshield.xml (100%)
 rename Geometry/MuonCommonData/data/{v2 => muonNumbering/2015/v1}/muonNumbering.xml (100%)
 rename Geometry/MuonCommonData/data/{v6/muonGemNumbering17.xml => muonNumbering/2017/v1/muonNumbering.xml} (100%)
 rename Geometry/MuonCommonData/data/{v6 => muonNumbering/2019/v1}/muonGemNumbering.xml (100%)
 rename Geometry/MuonCommonData/data/{v2 => rpcf/2015/v1}/rpcf.xml (100%)
 rename Geometry/MuonCommonData/data/{PhaseII => rpcf/2023/v1}/rpcf.xml (100%)
 delete mode 100644 Geometry/MuonCommonData/data/v2/muonGemNumbering.xml
title: Restructure XML Data Directories by Year and Version Step 2
